about.title: About AFP Deck
description: AFP News Deck is a reader for AFP feeds. It allows you to fetch and read stories, multimedia articles and photos directly in your browser.
Made with love by AFP Dataviz team, on a original idea by the Medialab. Data is provided by API AFP.

not-authenticated.title: Log in to enjoy fresh news
not-authenticated.external: If you don't work at AFP and you want to connect using a specific client id, {0}.
not-authenticated.afp: If you want to log in using the AFP account, {0}.

connectivity.message: Your device lost its internet connection.

tour.search:
Type your search terms here, then enter.

You can use conditional operatos like AND and OR, or search in specific fields using title:Worldcup by example
tour.products:
News, photos, graphics : decide what product you want.

When you're not logged in, you only view multimedia news wire from the previous day.
tour.languages:
6 languages are available. Select yours

Photos are only available in English
tour.urgencies: You can decide to only display important article like alerts, flashs, or topshots for photos.
tour.date-picker:
Articles are sorted from the youngest to the oldest.

Use this selector if you search for a specific date.
tour.new: Click here to add a column and start a new search.
tour.auto-refresh: Control the auto-refresh functionnality, to automatically fetch new articles.
tour.authenticate: Log in with your AFP credentials to start reading fresh articles.
